use_logo_label: Include a logo on the Landing Page?
greeting_msg_label: Landing Page Greeting Message (LANDINGPAGE_VARIABLES.GREETING_MESSAGE) - Note: use the placeholder {SESSION_FOCUS} in the text box below for dynamic count)
session_start_label: Session Start Message (MODERATOR_VARIABLES.SESSION_START - Note: use the placeholder {ideasCount} in the text box below for dynamic count)
default_config_loaded_msg: Default configuration loaded for the selected language.
critical_error_no_translations: Critical error: UI translations could not be loaded. Please check locale files.
error_generic_format: Formatting error for key '{key}': {e}. Raw string: '{raw_string}'. Args: {args}
data_editor_info_list: Edit items. Add or remove rows as needed.
warning_not_dict: {variable_name} is not a dictionary. Cannot display editor.
warning_not_list_str: {variable_name} is not a list of strings. Editor might not behave as expected.
default_session_focus: The effects of local textile companies on your daily life and your community.
default_check_ideas: Check the box to submit your ideas
default_round_change_msg1: Updating your sheet with new ideas from other participantsâ€¦
default_round_change_msg2: Please wait for the script to finish before proceeding to avoid errors.
default_session_complete: Thank you for your valuable contributions! Your answers have been successfully saved.
default_mod_session_start_template: Please submit {ideasCount} ideas for Round 1. Check the box when done.
default_lp_greeting_message_template:
Dear Participants, 

Welcome and thank you for your interest in this structured electronic brainwriting session! Our goal today is to collaboratively generate innovative ideas regarding: {SESSION_FOCUS}. 

At the core of this session, there is a no-judgment policy. We encourage you to force your imagination beyond its limits, regardless of the common beliefs or possibilities. When ideas are exchanged each round, it may inspire another participant to come up with something innovative! 

You will be guided through rounds of generating ideas and building upon the ideas of others. Full instructions and details were provided in your email. Please review them if you haven't already. 

Please navigate to the worksheet tab assigned to you. You'll find detailed instructions in the email sent earlier. Let's innovate together!

default_lp_totals_infix:
At the end of the session, group can produce total 
{totalIdeas} ideas in just {totalTime} minutes
default_an_popup_title: Proceed to Data Analysis in Colab
default_an_colab_step1_part1: Click this link to open the analysis notebook in Google Colab:
default_an_colab_step1_small_text: (This will open the notebook directly from GitHub. If you want to save your work in the notebook, use "File > Save a copy in Drive" in Colab.)
default_an_colab_step2: Once the Colab notebook is open, find the first cell labeled "SETUP".
default_an_colab_step3: Copy the following variables and paste it into SETUP field in Colab:
help_session_focus: The main topic or focus of the CSEB session, visible in landing page, participant sheets, and moderator sheet (GLOBAL_VARIABLES.SESSION_FOCUS)
help_number_participants: Set the number of participants for the CSEB session, visible in landing page, participant sheets, and moderator sheet.
help_list_participants: Toggle for customizing the participant sheet names. Sheet names will be auto-sanitized (spaces to underscores, special chars removed).
help_minutes_round: Duration of each round in minutes, integer number, visible in landing page, participant sheets, and moderator sheet (GLOBAL_VARIABLES.MINUTES)
help_number_rounds: Number of rounds in the CESB session, list of round names can be found in Advanced Customization section.
help_number_ideas: Number of ideas required in each round, list of idea names can be found in Advanced Customization section.
help_logo_landing_page: Please provide a URL ending with .png, .jpg, .jpeg, or .gif.
instructions_and_tips:
### How to Use This Tool 

**Quick Setup**: 
- Shows only the essential variables you need to configure. 
- Use toggle to configure participant sheet names manually. 
- By default, Round and Idea names are given Round N. To change, go to Variable Localization. 

**After Configuration**: 
- Click "Generate Script". 
- Click "Copy to Clipboad" to copy 
- Paste the code into your Google Apps Script. 

**Variable Localization**: 
- Together with Quick Setup, this section consists of text elements visible to participants. 
- Translate them if there is no language option given. 

**Advanced Customization**: 
- Advanced Customization gives you access to the remaining configuration options. 
- Colors can be entered as named colors (e.g., "red") or hex codes (e.g., "#ff0000").
help_advanced_settings: This experimental feature allows sessions to be conducted concurrently in multiple languages, powered by GOOGLETRANSLATE function.
